long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚úÖ Chrome Extension Builder is a powerful and user-friendly tool designed for developers and enthusiasts who want to create Google Chrome extensions with ease. This extension allows you to generate a manifest.json file and other necessary files, easily configuring permissions, themes, and advanced features such as using IndexedDB or injecting content scripts.

‚öôÔ∏è Key Features of Chrome Extension Builder:

Integrated Code Editor: With an advanced editor based on CodeMirror, you can write and edit code in various languages like JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and JSON, featuring syntax highlighting, autocompletion, and automatic language detection.

Permissions Generator: Quickly select the permissions your extension needs from a comprehensive and detailed list. This includes common permissions like activeTab, cookies, storage, and more.

Automated Functions: Inject predefined functions by simply selecting an option from the menu, such as setting the extension's icon text, sending notifications, creating context menus, and much more.

Theme Customization: Change the theme of the editor and the extension interface to match your preferences, with automatic storage of your settings so you always work in your preferred environment.

Integrated Chatbot: Get instant help and suggestions while building your extension with an integrated chatbot that is available to answer your questions and guide you through the development process.

üí° With Chrome Extension Builder, you can go from an idea to a functional Chrome extension in just a few steps, making the development process more accessible, faster, and efficient.
